level.heading: ADULT[SLASH]CHILD RATIOS IN EXPANDED CHILD DEVELOPMENT HOMES (ยง 29-359)

level.text: Each Expanded Child Development Home shall comply with the adult/child ratio requirements contained within section 343 of this Chapter.

An Expanded Child Development Home may provide care for more than two (2) children who are non-ambulatory or under two (2) years of age, provided that the number of such children does not exceed the following:
Four (4) children if there are two (2) Caregivers present; or
Six (6) children if there are three (3) or more Caregivers present.
